Our Products

Two flagship products transforming how industrial enterprises approach AI and automation.

Facilis AI Agent

Your AI-powered engineering partner, designed to supercharge productivity and creativity. Build apps, automate workflows, and solve complex problems with advanced AI and seamless integrations.

Key Features

  • Generate production-ready code in seconds
  • Automate repetitive tasks and focus on innovation
  • Collaborate with AI to solve complex problems
  • Integrate with databases, APIs, and cloud services

Unleash your potential with a platform that adapts to you.

Learn More
|

App Marketplace (AMP)

Your gateway to ready-to-use, AI-powered applications. Instantly deploy, customize, and scale apps for analytics, automation, and visualization—all from a unified platform.

Key Features

  • Browse a curated marketplace of AI apps
  • One-click deploy to workspace or cloud
  • Customize apps to fit your workflow
  • Collaborate and share with the community

Transform ideas into reality with the AMP ecosystem.

Making AI Accessible

Facilis, Latin for 'easy', is at the heart of everything we do. Our mission is to make advanced AI accessible for manufacturers, empowering them to make data-informed decisions seamlessly and effortlessly.

Our Mission

To bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI technology and practical manufacturing applications. We empower field engineers and operators to quickly resolve issues and adapt to the varied demands of daily operations through intelligent automation and domain expertise.

Our Vision

To revolutionize manufacturing operations at scale by developing a platform that harnesses cutting-edge AI and machine learning. We enable decision-makers to build their own AI-powered applications, tailored to their challenges and rooted in deep asset knowledge.

Why Choose Facilis.AI?

Born from firsthand experience with the challenges of implementing AI in manufacturing environments

Rapid Implementation

Deploy and see results in days, not months, with our streamlined AI platform

Measurable ROI

Track tangible returns with clear metrics and performance indicators

Expert Support

Industry veterans with 15+ years of manufacturing and AI expertise
